signals.message: 1 formatting region(s) to update (50 lines affected)

edits.content:
# Load index data
        index_cache = get_index_cache()
        df = index_cache.load()

        # Ensure required columns exist
        required_columns = (
            [
                CRD_COLUMN,
                NAME_COLUMN,
                STATE_COLUMN,
                CITY_COLUMN,
                COUNTRY_COLUMN,
                DOMAIN_COLUMN,
                AUM_COLUMN,
                DISCRETIONARY_AUM_COLUMN,
                NON_DISCRETIONARY_AUM_COLUMN,
                EMPLOYEES_COLUMN,
                OFFICES_COLUMN,
            ]
            + list(CLIENT_TYPE_COLUMNS.values())
            + list(FUND_COLUMNS.values())
        )

        ensure_columns(df, required_columns)

        # Attach domain column
        df_domain = attach_domain_column(df, DOMAIN_COLUMN)

        # Apply filters (name is not used in filtering - it's used for search after filtering)
        filtered_df = filter_companies(
            df_domain,
